ValidationRule.description: Pre-Sales Req: 2327. No Two Cost Business Group Should be the same. Updated for Sprint 11, PreSales Req: 3459
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND($Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, IF( OR( ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c) && PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c<> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c) && PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c <> 0, ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c) && PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c<> 0 ), IF (OR(AND(OR(ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c), ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c), ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c)), OR((PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c))),
AND(OR(ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c), ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c)), OR((PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c), (PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c))),
AND(OR(ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c), ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c)), OR((PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c), (PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c), (PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c), (PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c))),
AND(OR(ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c), ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c)), OR((PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c), (PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c), (PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c))),
AND(OR(ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c)), OR((PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c), (PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c))),
AND(OR(ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c),ISCHANGED(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c)), OR((PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c == PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c))) ),True , false ), False ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter the same amount for costs for different BGs or BUs
